Bubb InfotipCSS andor JS

Pure, minimal CSS infotip. Add class "bubb-delay" (or modify global bubb.scss variables) to add a reveal delay. A bubb with HTML content may want to be class(ified) as "bubb-interactive". If you really don't care for transitions add "bubb-still".

CSS attribute
CSS element
Child element with HTML content

Non-dependent, minimal JS script that simplifies utilization of bubbs as UI menus (with callbacks) and, most importantly, uses simple markup references so that bubb content can be dynamically maintained in a configuration object. Available options are listed in the final code block. The menu gets a "bubb-menu" class for targeted styling. Mouseover-events are still handled by CSS :hover.
